snippet.title: Penny's Big Breakaway - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ready, set, YO! From Evening Star and Private Division, Penny's Big Breakaway is coming early 2024 for Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

In this 3D platforming adventure, you’ll explore the bright and colorful world of Macaroon, and help Penny and Yo-Yo escape the clutches of the grouchy Emperor Eddie. Perform stylish, acrobatic tricks to avoid Eddie’s massive horde of pushy penguins in Story Mode. Power up Yo-Yo to protect Penny and put your speed running skills to the test in Time Attack Mode to unlock special items and complete secret stages.

Wishlist now: https://pvtdi.vision/3N8uEVp

Follow us to stay in the loop on Penny’s Big Breakaway:
YouTube: @eveningstarstudio
Twitter: @EveningStarStdo
Instagram: @EveningStarStdo
Facebook: @EveningStarInc

#PennysBigBreakaway #NintendoSwitch #PS5 #XboxSeriesX #XboxSeriesS
